turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I am tired! Are you available to order some coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah I can do that. Where do you want coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up from the Starbucks on LaPorte Ave. in Valparaiso, IN.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me know what you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am leaning towards a good ol' caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is regular 2% milk okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, I want to try the nonfat milk this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I can do that. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, sorry to make it difficult but are you able to order it with additional ingredients?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what did you want added to your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them do an extra pump of vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, have them add a shot of espresso so I can stay awake.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! I'll start ordering it for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, let me know when the order is placed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. It'll be waiting for you shortly at the LaPorte Ave Starbucks in Valparaiso and the receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks again. Goodbye.
